description: Serve thirsty customers before they reach the end of the bar in this fast-paced retro management sim.
rationale: This game tests multitasking skills, reflexes, and resource management. It is designed for players who enjoy high-pressure arcade classics and for AI agents to learn optimal pathfinding and task prioritization.
details: The game consists of four horizontal bars. Customers appear at the left end of each bar and slowly advance toward the right. The player controls a bartender who must pour drinks and send them sliding down the bar to the customers. When a customer receives a drink, they are pushed back or exit the screen. If a customer reaches the right end of the bar, or if the player throws a drink where there is no customer, a life is lost. Empty mugs are occasionally sent back by customers, which the player must catch to avoid breakage. The game speed and customer frequency increase over time.

technical_specs.state_space: Customer positions, bartender position, drink positions, empty mug positions
technical_specs.action_space: Move Up, Move Down, Pour/Throw Drink

how_to_play: Use the UP and DOWN arrow keys to switch between the four bars. Press the SPACEBAR to pour a drink and send it sliding left. Scoring: 100 points for serving a customer, 50 points for catching an empty mug. Game ends when a customer reaches the bartender's end or 3 lives are lost.
